name: Mindtheatre - Stay in control
description:
Overview

Team: Smoking Brains
Projekttitel: Mindtheatre
Genre: Tower Defense/Strategie
Perspektive: 2,5 D
Zielgruppe: 14+
Spielmodus: Singleplayer
Plattform: PC
Steuerung: Maus & Tastatur

Game Vision

"Stay in Control" - you might think when you play the crazy puppeteer in his Mindtheatre. 

Here, the puppets have developed a life of their own against their creator and must now be controlled and eliminated by tactical control before they can reach and eliminate the puppeteer.

The puppeteer now loses himself more and more in his play until madness catches up with him at some point.

Experience

  • USP: Puppet Master can take control of enemy puppets
  • Strategy: Choose the right dolls to win in the end
  • Three types of enemies with different characteristics: tank, ranged fighter and runner
  • Setting: Theatre stage
